tool_description: Estimates transaction costs including commissions, spreads, and other trading fees for portfolio rebalancing trades.

asset_symbols.description: Array of asset symbols to trade

error_messages: Array length mismatch: asset_symbols, trade_quantities, and trade_directions must have same length.
Invalid trade direction: Each direction must be 'buy' or 'sell'.
Invalid broker type: Must be one of [discount, full_service, institutional].
Invalid quantities: All trade quantities must be positive numbers.
usage: Provide arrays of asset_symbols, trade_quantities, and trade_directions. Specify broker_type and market_hours for accurate cost estimation.

cost_percentage.description: Total cost as percentage of trade value
